body.p:
To his Excy
Thomas E Bramlette
Governor &c
Frankfort Ky
Sir

By the Judgment of W R Carson a Justice of the peace for Lincoln County the undersigned was fined $22, for a breach of the peace occasioned by striking Joseph Hughes -- Hughes called publicly to the face of your petitioner that he yr. petitioner was a damned liar & a damned Thief and there upon your petioner struck him -- for this & only this he was fined --
The insult was unprovoked & the quarrel very sudden he prays for the remission of the fine
The undersigned concur in the petition of P Spraggins

Joshua F Bell
T, P, Hill
M. J. Dunham
J E Huffman
Fon T Fox
M H Owsley

Lincoln Co
vs
P. Spragens
$22 --
Breach Peace
Remit
24th Sept/64
There are many better men than Spraggins but he is truthful -- his veracity can not be questioned I trust you may regard it consistent with propriety to give him the remission
